summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Specialized in React, Node.js, Python, and AWS. Proven track record of improving system reliability by 24% and optimizing API latency by 31% in high-traffic enterprise environments.
experience_albertsons: Designed and developed cloud-based microservices using Python and Node.js, improving service reliability by 24% in customer-facing applications.
Built and deployed RESTful APIs supporting large-scale distributed systems, reducing request latency by 31% through optimized service design.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines on AWS using GitHub Actions and cloud-native tooling, shortening release cycles by 28%.
Translated business and technical requirements into scalable application features, delivering enhancements within 2--4 month project timelines.
Developed secure backend services with role-based access controls, reducing security-related defects by 19%.
Supported multi-page web applications using React and JavaScript, improving frontend load performance by 22%.
Analyzed and processed large transactional datasets to support application logic, improving data-processing throughput by 35%.
Authored technical documentation covering system architecture, API contracts, and deployment workflows, accelerating team onboarding by 21%.
Collaborated with product managers and architects to evaluate new technologies, contributing to 3 successful proof-of-concept implementations.
Troubleshot and debugged production issues across distributed services, reducing mean-time-to-resolution by 18%.
Coordinated development priorities with a 4-member agile team, consistently meeting sprint delivery commitments.
Provided guidance and code reviews for junior engineers, improving code quality and reducing rework by 16%.
experience_valuelabs: Developed multi-page web applications using React, JavaScript, and Python, supporting business workflows for enterprise clients.
Implemented backend services using Java and Python, improving application stability by 20% across supported modules.
Designed and maintained microservice-based architectures, enabling independent scaling of services and reducing deployment risk.
Built and optimized SQL-based data access layers, improving query performance by 26%.
Supported cloud-based delivery environments on AWS, assisting with deployments and configuration management.
Processed and analyzed large, complex datasets to support application features, improving response accuracy by 14%.
Ensured software security by implementing input validation, authentication checks, and secure coding practices.
Participated in full software development lifecycle activities including design, development, testing, and release management.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Debugged and resolved application defects, reducing recurring production issues by 17%.
Contributed to UI design and development efforts, improving usability scores by 15%.
Mentored junior developers on coding standards and debugging techniques, improving team productivity by 13%.

projects.name: Cloud-Native Distributed Application Development
bullets: Designed a cloud-based distributed system using AWS services, supporting scalable application workloads.
Developed backend services in Python and Node.js with REST APIs to handle concurrent requests efficiently.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment, reducing manual release effort by 30%.
Built a React-based frontend to support multi-page user interactions with backend services.
Applied security best practices including authentication and access control across services.
Documented system design, trade-offs, and deployment architecture in a comprehensive technical report.

projects.name: Web Application Architecture and Optimization Project
bullets: Designed and developed a full-stack web application using React, Python, and SQL.
Optimized backend data access patterns, improving response times by 23%.
Implemented modular UI components to improve maintainability and reuse.
Conducted functional and integration testing to validate application behavior.
Analyzed performance bottlenecks and applied targeted improvements.
Delivered the project within a 4-month academic timeline with complete documentation.
